PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-14042013-12-12,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectRemission Order
PrecisOrder makes a remission to BlackBerry Limited of taxes paid for the 2009 to 2012 taxation years. In effect, it enables the company to have undertaken a transaction to obtain early a portion of a refund that otherwise would have been received after its March 1, 2014 year-end without reducing the total amount of that refund.
AttachmentsAttachment
